section.86: Limits and Punishments set by Allah (Hudood)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:The Prophet (ï·º) cursed the effeminate men and those women who assume the similitude (manners) of men. He also said, "Turn them out of your houses." He turned such-and-such person out, and `Umar also turned out such-and-such person
